We're launching a consultation on our u‚Ä¶

@EnvAgency  People are still Open Water swimming in the rivers even in this weather. as swimming pools are closed. 
Why are over 100000 litres per second  of raw sewage being pumped into the rivers by Water companies without notice to the public ?

The @EnvAgency has set out plans to safeguard water supplies and protect the environment in some of England‚Äôs most seriously water stressed areas, which are soon to double in number, though abstraction reform still looks to be a way off.

https://t.co/D3Q2HhY084
